ReportSection.ReportItem:
Otago Exercise Program
An in-person falls prevention program

The idea behind the evidence-based Otago Exercise Program is that muscle strength, flexibility, balance, and reaction time can all be improved to reduce your risk of falling.

We provide in-person instruction with a trained Otago fitness leader once per week.
You do the prescribed exercises 2 additional times each week on your own.

Best suited for:
  • Persons who have fallen in the past year.
  • Persons who have muscle weakness and balance difficulties.
  • Persons who can walk in their own home with or without a walking aid
